title: Bootcamp or degree?
content: I'm wondering if it's worth it to go to a bootcamp or if I should go back to school and get a degree in computer science.

title: Mac or PC?
content: I want to get a new computer but I'm not sure if I should get a Mac or a PC. What do you think?

title: Work from home or in the office?
content: I'm wondering if I should work from home or in the office. What do you think?
